message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be incredibly valuable, worth far more than its market price. I'm confident it will be a game-changer for you.  While I can't disclose the details just yet, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a substantial discount from its true potential value. Let me know your thoughts, and I'd be happy to answer any questions you may have.
